template.name: Notification with information about disable system.
template.subject: CzechIdM - na systému '$systemName' byla zablokována operace '$operationName'

## Return style by provisioning operation #macro( getLevelColor $change ) #set( $updated = "UPDATE" ) #set( $added = "CREATE" ) #set( $removed = "DELETE" ) #if( $added == $change) background-color: #5cb85c; display: inline; padding: .2em .6em .3em;font-size: 85%; color: #fff; border-radius: .25em; font-weight: bold; margin: 2px; #elseif( $updated == $change) background-color: #f0ad4e; display: inline; padding: .2em .6em .3em;font-size: 85%; color: #fff; border-radius: .25em; font-weight: bold; margin: 2px; #elseif( $removed == $change) background-color: #d9534f; display: inline; padding: .2em .6em .3em;font-size: 85%; color: #fff; border-radius: .25em; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: line-through; margin: 2px; #end #end Dobrý den,
na systému '$systemName' byla zablokována operace: $operationName.
